ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: No ONE person will be able to get the fiery avenger by himself.  It s IMPOSSIBLE.  It takes 3 FULL groups to kill a dragon.  When a mob has over 16k hit
ygData.messageBody:
No ONE person will be able to get the fiery avenger by himself. It's
IMPOSSIBLE. It takes 3 FULL groups to kill a dragon. When a mob has
over 16k hit points, you're not gonna solo it by any means. They made
it so the power weapons in this game were very hard to get. You have to
EARN them. And yes.. the fiery avenger is a paladin only sword. It's
a fact.. deal with it. And no one has it on any server. It pays to
have friends in high places. Get the inside scoop on many issues..
Only thing that sucks is that ya have to deal with being jealous of
every one of them.
